snippet: Hurricane damage will help construction companies and the workers they plan to hire, many of whom have been idled and ailing from the housing bust for nearly half a decade.
abstract: Damage caused by Hurricane Sandy is good news for construction companies, contractors and workers they hire, many of whom have been idled from the housing bust for nearly half a decade; demand for construction services has skyrocketed since storm.

byline.original: By CATHERINE RAMPELL and SHAILA DEWAN

lead_paragraph: Hurricane damage will help construction companies and the workers they plan to hire, many of whom have been idled and ailing from the housing bust for nearly half a decade.

headline.main: For Builders, the Storm Is Good for Business
headline.print_headline: Beginning a Laborious Comeback: Sudden Demand for Builders Is Keenly Felt in Wake of Destruction
